title: List of guest lectures in Kshitij
content: This list is incomplete ; you can help by expanding it .
Professor Klaus Von Klitzing : is a Noble leaurate for physics in 1985 for the discovery of the Quantam Hall Effect.

Dr Guillermo Wille :is the Managing Director of the John F. Welch Technology Centre (JFWTC), GE's multidisciplinary R&D facility in Bangalore, India, was born in Bolivia of German parents.Dr.Wille obtained his Master's degree in Electrical Engineering from Aachen University and later his Ph.D in power electronics from the same University.
Professor Lord Sushanta Kumar Bhattacharya : is the director of Warwick Manufacturing Group, he was also Padma Bhushan by the Government of India.

R. Gopalakrishnan : is executive director of Tata Sons, chairman of Rallis India and vice-chairman of Tata Chemicals. He is a director of several Tata Group companies such as Tata Motors, Tata Power and Tata Internet Services. He also serves on the board of two non-Tata companies, ICI and Castrol India.

Dr. Rajagopalan Chidambaram : principal scientific advisor to the Govt. of India, played a leading role in the design and execution of the Peaceful Nuclear Explosion experiment at Pokhran in 1974 and led the DAE team that conducted the explosion in 1998.
Dr.Farrokh Mistree : is an Emeritus professor in Woodruff School of Mechanical Engineering in Georgia Institute of Technology.
Richard Matthew Stallman [ 2 ] : He is the father of the GNU project and the founder of Free Software Foundation (FSF), RMS is also know as the creator of popular text editor emacs.
